answers.answer: Hi there.There can be several reasons for this occurrence and the most common of which are impinged or stressed nerves in the area.  This can be due to compression during sleep or with actual anatomical compression caused by spine problems.  Vitamin B deficiency as well as the mineral calcium deficiency can also cause problems in the nerves.  Metabolic problems such as diabetes can also cause neuropathies that can present with these symptoms.  I suggest that this should be formally evaluated by a doctor as there can be a lot of possibilities.  Regards.

question: What cuold cause this problem.
